rules_text: [i]Adorned[/i] – Mosshide Nodorog can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less as long as it's equipped and/or enchanted.
flavor_text:
[i]“Who thought enchanting nodorogs to clear land was a good idea? They were destructive enough when it wasn't their purpose.”
—Pyrra, Glyris Advisor[/i]
